LanguageData.SRV_ShelterDoor.label: shelter door
LanguageData.SRV_ShelterDoor.description: A simple shelter door to separate rooms. Quick to pass through, but quick to destroy.
LanguageData.SRV_WallShelter.label: shelter wall
LanguageData.SRV_WallShelter.description: A simple shelter wall made from wood. Capable of holding up a roof, but is easily destroyed. Needs to be manually deconstructed when building in its place.
